sentences.en: An actual example is used to demonstrate the appropriation of the model.
sentences.cn: 同时结合实例说明这种方法的合理性.

sentences.en: Disaster relief emergency fund appropriation mechanism.
sentences.cn: 救灾应急资金拨付机制.

sentences.en: He made an appropriation of USD 20, 000 for payment of debts.
If Congress would make a sufficient appropriation, a colossal benefit would result.
sentences.cn: 如果国会能拨出一笔足够的专款,就会产生绝大的好处.

sentences.en: Love mostly is double sided. dedication at front, appropriation at back side.
sentences.cn: 多数人所谓的爱,都具备两面:正面是奉献, 背面是占有.

sentences.en: Other charges include fraud and illegal appropriation of land.
sentences.cn: 其他指控包括欺诈罪和非法侵占土地罪。

sentences.en: Responsible for managing the construction fund and checking the construction appropriation periodically.
sentences.cn: 负责基建资金的管理并定期核对基建拨款.

sentences.en: Support R & D to prepare capital appropriation request.
sentences.cn: 帮助 研发 中心申请资金预拨.

sentences.en: The act provided a continuing annual appropriation.
sentences.cn: 这一法案提供了持续的年度拨款.

sentences.en: The appropriation of the land made it possible to have a new building.
sentences.cn: 该块土地的拨用使得建造新楼成为可能.

sentences.en: The council could note an annual appropriation for this service.
sentences.cn: 议会可以为这项服务表决给他一笔常年经费.

sentences.en: The government raised defence appropriations by 12 percent.
sentences.cn: 政府将国防拨款提高了12%。

sentences.en: The law protects trade secrets from wrongful appropriation.
sentences.cn: 法律保护商业秘密不被非法窃取.

sentences.en: The proposed appropriation failed to go through.
sentences.cn: 建议拨款的提案未被通过.

sentences.en: V appropriation equipments, speed is quick and the yield is big.
sentences.cn: 三相电源装用设备, 速度快,产量大.

sentences.en: What is a tentative advertising appropriation?
